mean_en: a device that is attached to people or objects to make them fall slowly and safely when they are dropped from an aircraft. It consists of a large piece of thin cloth that opens out in the air to form an umbrella shape.
sentence: The fox uses a parachute to descend.
sentence_trans: 这只狐狸用降落伞来下降。
word_etyma: para防，避开，保护 ＋ chute降落伞 → parachute降落伞
